comments:
Using WTP1.5.2 20061021

1. load struts-examples.war
2. open exercise/html-link.jsp
3. in body tag, start typing "leftmargin="asdfasdfadf""
4. get an error dialog and the below in the log.

*Note, I tried recreating this using a new file, but I was not able to.  I think there's something about the contents of html-link.jsp that causes this error.  Maybe the number of children, lines, indentation.  I'm unsure.
